messages.subject: Re: crunchy?
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a quiz you can take to see how crunchy you are.  You can tell by the kind of questions it asks exactly what you must do to call yourself crunchy . lol
messages.messageBody:
Here's a quiz you can take to see how crunchy you are. You can tell
by the kind of questions it asks exactly what you must do to call
yourself "crunchy". lol (And it was interesting that homeschooling
with no curriculum gives you more points than homeschooling with
curriculum).

http://www.naturalmotheringutah.org/gfq.htm

Sheila

> Can someone tell me what this term means - I have come across it -
> 'crunchy' - a couple of times and have no idea! Thanks.
> Melissa.

messages.subject: Re: crunchy?
messages.msgSnippet: Crunchy is shorthand for granola-crunching-Birkenstock-wearing-tree-hugging-Earth-mother-type. You know, the kind of folks you find at Whole Foods buying
messages.messageBody:
"Crunchy" is shorthand for
granola-crunching-Birkenstock-wearing-tree-hugging-Earth-mother-type.

You know, the kind of folks you find at Whole Foods buying organic
produce and wafting patcholi and sandelwood through the aisles . . .

:-)

~Sue (a granola-crunching-Birkenstock-wearing-tree-
hugging-Earth-mother-type)


> Can someone tell me what this term means - I have come across it -
> 'crunchy' - a couple of times and have no idea! Thanks.
> Melissa.

s0340

messages.subject: crunchy?
messages.msgSnippet: Can someone tell me what this term means - I have come across it - crunchy - a couple of times and have no idea! Thanks. Melissa.
messages.messageBody:
Can someone tell me what this term means - I have come across it -
'crunchy' - a couple of times and have no idea! Thanks.
Melissa.
